sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Eastern Will Sanitary District Act.

sections.heading: District established.
sections.text:
A sanitary district is formed
to be known as the Eastern Will Sanitary District for the purpose of
constructing, acquiring, operating, improving, extending, and maintaining a
plant or plants for the purification and treatment of sewage; the
maintenance of one or more outlets for the drainage of sewage that has
been treated and purified by these plant or plants; and for the purpose of
constructing, acquiring, operating, improving, extending, and maintaining one
or more waterworks.

sections.heading: Territory of District.
sections.text:
The District shall be comprised of the
following territory:

sections.heading: Board of trustees; creation; term; bond; quorum; disqualification;
Board of trustees; corporate powers; officers and employees;
This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
